languages.text: "От лица офицерского собрания смею отметить, что почтенный сенешаль Версериан достойно справлялся со своими обязанностями и предотвратил немало трагедий, которые грозили обрушиться на ваше владения в это непростое время". {n}Данрок звучно хлопает в ладони, и аплодисменты подхватывают все собравшиеся. Абеляр принимает почести с равнодушной усталостью и бледной улыбкой.{/n}

"On behalf of the officers' council, I dare say that the esteemed Seneschal Werserian performed his duties with distinction and averted many tragedies that threatened your domain in these trying times." {n}Danrok starts clapping, and the rest of the assembly joins in the applause. Abelard accepts the accolade with a faint smile of weary indifference.{/n}
languages.original_text: "От лица офицерского собрания смею отметить, что почтенный сенешаль Версериан достойно справлялся со своими обязанностями и предотвратил немало трагедий, которые грозили обрушиться на ваше владения в это непростое время". {n}Данрок звучно хлопает в ладони, и аплодисменты подхватывают все собравшиеся. Абеляр принимает почести с равнодушной усталостью и бледной улыбкой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "On the part of the officers' assembly, I humbly note that the esteemed Seneschal Werserian performed the duties of his function in the most worthy way, preventing many tragedies that threatened to befall your domain in these trying times." {n}Danrok claps his hands reasonantly, and the entire gathering joins in the applause. Abelard accepts the accolade with a pale smile of weary indifference.{/n}
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "On the part of the officers' assembly, I humbly note that the esteemed Seneschal Werserian performed the duties of his function in the most worthy way, preventing many tragedies that threatened to befall your domain in these trying times." {n}Danrok claps his hands reasonantly, and the entire gathering joins in the applause. Abelard accepts the accolade with a pale smile of weary indifference.{/n}

Abelard accepts the accolade with a faint smile of weary indifference.{/n}

Abelard accepts the accolade with a faint smile of weary indifference.{/n}

Abelard accepts the accolade with a faint smile of weary indifference.{/n}
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "On behalf of the officers' council, I dare say that the esteemed Seneschal Werserian performed his duties with distinction and averted many tragedies that threatened your domain in these trying times." {n}Danrok starts clapping, and the rest of the assembly joins in the applause. Abelard accepts the accolade with a faint smile of weary indifference.{/n}
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: «En nombre del consejo de oficiales, me atrevería a afirmar que el estimado senescal Werserian ha cumplido su deber con distinción y ha evitado numerosas tragedias que amenazaban sus dominios en estos tiempos aciagos». {n}Danrok empieza a aplaudir, y el resto de la asamblea se une a él. Abelard acepta el elogio con una tenue y lánguida sonrisa de indiferencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "On behalf of the officers' council, I dare say that the esteemed Seneschal Werserian performed his duties with distinction and averted many tragedies that threatened your domain in these trying times." {n}Danrok starts clapping, and the rest of the assembly joins in the applause. Abelard accepts the accolade with a faint smile of weary indifference.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «En nombre del consejo de oficiales, me atrevería a afirmar que el estimado senescal Werserian ha cumplido su deber con distinción y ha evitado numerosas tragedias que amenazaban sus dominios en estos tiempos aciagos». {n}Danrok empieza a aplaudir, y todos los presentes se unen a él. Abelard acepta el elogio con una tenue y lánguida sonrisa de indiferencia.{/n}
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: “身为军官议会的代表，我可以说，在这艰难的时刻，尊敬的韦尔森总领出色地履行了他的职责，让您的王朝免于许多可怕的悲剧。”{n}丹罗克带头开始鼓掌，随后其他人跟着一起鼓掌。阿贝拉德疲倦地挤出一丝微笑，接受了这份荣誉。{/n}
languages.original_text: "On behalf of the officers' council, I dare say that the esteemed Seneschal Werserian performed his duties with distinction and averted many tragedies that threatened your domain in these trying times." {n}Danrok starts clapping, and the rest of the assembly joins in the applause. Abelard accepts the accolade with a faint smile of weary indifference.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “身为军官议会的代表，我可以说，在这艰难的时刻，尊敬的韦尔森总领出色地履行了他的职责，让您的王朝免于许多可怕的悲剧。”{n}丹罗克带头开始鼓掌，其他人跟着一起故障。阿贝拉德疲倦地挤出一丝微笑，接受了这份荣誉。{/n}
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: « Au nom du conseil des officiers, je tiens à dire que le très estimé sénéchal Werserian a effectué son devoir avec distinction, en réussissant notamment à éviter nombre d'événements tragiques qui ont menacé votre domaine au cours de cette période difficile. » {n}Danrok se met à applaudir, bientôt rejoint par le reste de l'assemblée. Abélard accepte l'accolade avec un léger sourire teinté de fatigue et d'indifférence.{/n}
languages.original_text: "On behalf of the officers' council, I dare say that the esteemed Seneschal Werserian performed his duties with distinction and averted many tragedies that threatened your domain in these trying times." {n}Danrok starts clapping, and the rest of the assembly joins in the applause. Abelard accepts the accolade with a faint smile of weary indifference.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Au nom du conseil des officiers, je tiens à dire que le très estimé sénéchal Werserian a effectué son devoir avec distinction, en réussissant notamment à éviter nombre d'événements tragiques qui ont menacé votre domaine au cours de cette période difficile. » {n}Danrok se met à applaudir, bientôt rejoint par toute l'assemblée. Abélard accepte l'accolade avec un léger sourire teinté de fatigue et d'indifférence.{/n}
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: 「士官議会を代表して申し上げますが、尊敬するウェルザリアン家令長はその職務を立派に遂行され、この困難な時にあなたの領地を脅かす多くの悲劇を回避されました」{n}ダンロックが拍手を始めると、他の参加者たちも拍手に加わる。アベラルドは、疲れたような無関心をつくろったかすかな笑みを浮かべながら、その栄誉を受け取る。{/n}
languages.original_text: "On behalf of the officers' council, I dare say that the esteemed Seneschal Werserian performed his duties with distinction and averted many tragedies that threatened your domain in these trying times." {n}Danrok starts clapping, and the rest of the assembly joins in the applause. Abelard accepts the accolade with a faint smile of weary indifference.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「士官議会を代表して申し上げますが、尊敬するウェルザリアン家令長はその職務を立派に遂行され、この困難な時にあなたの領地を脅かす多くの悲劇を回避されました」{n}ダンロックが拍手を始めると、他の参加者たちも拍手に加わる。アベラルドは、疲れたような無関心をつくろったかすかな笑みを浮かべながら、その栄誉を受け取る。{/n}
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "Im Namen des Offiziersrats darf ich berichten, dass der ehrenwerte Truchsess Werserian seine Pflichten ganz hervorragend erfüllt hat. Er hat eine ganze Reihe von Tragödien abgewendet, die Euer Reich in diesen schwierigen Zeiten bedroht haben." {n}Danrok beginnt zu klatschen, und die gesamte Versammlung stimmt in den Applaus mit ein. Abelard akzeptiert das Lob mit einem schwachen Lächeln der erschöpften Gleichgültigkeit.{/n}
languages.original_text: "On behalf of the officers' council, I dare say that the esteemed Seneschal Werserian performed his duties with distinction and averted many tragedies that threatened your domain in these trying times." {n}Danrok starts clapping, and the rest of the assembly joins in the applause. Abelard accepts the accolade with a faint smile of weary indifference.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "In Namen des Offiziersrats darf ich berichten, dass der ehrenwerte Truchsess Werserian seine Pflichten ganz hervorragend erfüllt hat. Er hat eine ganze Reihe von Tragödien abgewendet, die Euer Reich in diesen schwierigen Zeiten bedroht haben." {n}Danrok beginnt zu klatschen, und die gesamte Versammlung stimmt in den Applaus mit ein. Abelard akzeptiert das Lob mit einem schwachen Lächeln der erschöpften Gleichgültigkeit.{/n}
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "Subaylar konseyi adına saygıdeğer Seneşal Werserian'ın görevlerini liyakatle yerine getirdiğini ve bu zor zamanlarda diyarınıza tehdit oluşturan birçok trajediyi önlediğini söylemek isterim." {n}Danrok, alkışlamaya başlıyor. Geri kalanlar da ona katılıyor. Abelard, övgüleri yorgun bir umursamazlıkla kabul ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "On behalf of the officers' council, I dare say that the esteemed Seneschal Werserian performed his duties with distinction and averted many tragedies that threatened your domain in these trying times." {n}Danrok starts clapping, and the rest of the assembly joins in the applause. Abelard accepts the accolade with a faint smile of weary indifference.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Subaylar konseyi adına, saygıdeğer Seneşal Werserian'ın görevlerini liyakatle yerine getirdiğini ve bu zor zamanlarda diyarınızı tehlikeye atan birçok trajediyi önlediğini söylemek isterim." {n}Danrok alkışlamaya başlıyor ve geri kalanlar da ona katılıyor. Abelard, övgüleri yorgun bir umursamazlıkla kabul ediyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HighFactotum
